name: Half Giant
description: Half Giants are towering humanoids with immense physical strength and endurance, which is required in the harsh, snowy wastes of Yyeshi. They are known to be unyielding and stubborn, but have a soft connection with domesticated larger beasts which are required to survive in their homeland. Half-Giants are protective of their families and lands, rarely venturing out to experience other civilizations.

options.name: Unmovable
options.description: Half Giants are a broad and solid people. You cannot be Grappled or Displaced by non-Magical means by Creatures that are Large or smaller.

options.name: Action : Giant Toss
options.description: You take a modified version of the Shove action against a creature smaller than you. Instead of a success or fail, you can displace the creature 2 units, plus another unit for each successful might dice against their check to avoid it. The creature takes fall damage against the total distance traveled.

options.name: Giant's Fortitude
options.description: Your giant heritage grants you exceptional physical resilience and stamina. Gain +10 Health and +1 Might.
